reviewText: If you're a fan of Mail Call or it's host R. Lee Ermey, you definitely don't want to miss out on this DVD.  The bloopers are damn funny, and there's a nice collection of special chapters along with it. The only problem I had was the hour went too quick and I was hungry for more.Thanks for the laugh, Gunny!
summary: Now THIS is some Funny S#@*!
Title: Mail Call - Snafu DVD

reviewText: IF I WAS IN THE MILITARY THIS IS THE SARGENT I WOULD DEFINITELY WANT.THIS GUY IS FUNNY FOR ANY ONE TO WATCH. I JUST WISH HE HAD A VOICE OVER FOR MY GPS.
Title: Mail Call - Snafu DVD

reviewerName: David D. Lawson "A Legend in his own mind"
reviewText: If you like Bloopers , SNAFU's and TOFU than you are at the right place. My Family got quite a few laughs out of this DVD and think it is well worth the coin. Enjoy!
Title: Mail Call - Snafu DVD

reviewText: If you like the Mail Call show you will love this "blooper" version. The thing about R Lee is he is 100% sincere in his love for the Corps but he's also a born performer and it comes thru in his presentation of the show. What is unexpected is how funny he is and loveable he comes across in all the episodes. Like many of us I revered him in the movie "Full Metal Jacket" but you owe it to yourself if your a true fan to check him out in the comedy "Saving Silverman". The series Mail Call is one of my very favorite shows and this SNAFU DVD is great!
Title: Mail Call - Snafu DVD

reviewText: This DVD should have been twice as long. One can never have enough R. Lee...
Title: Mail Call - Snafu DVD
